1405570.name: RPG Maker MZ - Crystal Cavern Asset Pack
1405570.description:
The 2nd in Guttykreum's Fantasy themed series. Customize an elaborate cavern system and decorate it with all sorts of gleaming crystals.

This RPG Maker MV / MZ compatible asset pack contains unique detailed tiles to help you build a deep and expansive cavern for your players to go spelunking in. Design your own chambers, caves, and waterways covered in gem themed objects for players to explore: from a deep and dark stalagmite infested room to a grove of crystal trees!

This pack contains:

* Tilemaps and autotile compatible with RPG Maker MV / MZ
* 423 (48x48) crystal cavern themed tiles in png format
* Crystal themed objects including a crystal monolith and crystal mushrooms
* A crystal spider and golem to help populate your cavern
* 3 frame animated rocky stream bed tiles along with 3 frame waterfall animations
* Crystal flowers, crystal trees, lanterns, mine carts and more...
* 1 music track (Recollection) for you to use in your project by Failpositive, composed specifically for this asset pack. Comes in mp3, m4a, ogg, and wav!
* For use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice
1405570.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
